# Create Specification

Generate or update project specifications following the Mini Storefront pattern.

## Instructions

{{file:.github/prompts/create-specification.prompt.md}}

## Usage

Use this command to:
- Generate initial specs.md for new features
- Update existing specifications with implementation details
- Ensure specs follow the established project patterns

## Output

Creates or updates specification documents with:
- Complete tech stack details (Next.js 14, Prisma, TypeScript, Tailwind, Yarn)
- API endpoint specifications with Zod validation
- Database schema (Prisma models)
- Frontend routes and components
- Testing strategy (Vitest + Playwright)
- Deployment configuration (Vercel + Docker)
